H0.text: Coal, oil, and natural gas are not all renewable energy sources.

H1.text: Solar, oil, and geothermal are the energy sources that are all renewable.

H2.text: Wind, solar, and tidal are all renewable energy sources.

H3.text: Natural gas, solar, and tidal are all renewable energy sources.

A4.text: Renewable energy is usually understood as energy harnessed from continuously occurring natural phenomena.

A5.text: Solar power, wind power, hydroelectricity, geothermal energy, and biomass are widely agreed to be the main types of renewable energy.
